Articles.Content:
Attention Kerbonauts a recently launched nuclear powered satelite threatens to hit kerbin contaminating a large area of the planet as the intrepid kerbonauts you are you are tasked with taking the satelite out before it hits kerbin.

Tasks

-Launch a satelite into a 100km x 100km orbit

-Destroy the satelite

Awards

Jeb

Make a direct acent and destroy the satelite without getting into orbit

Epic

Get into orbit and destroy the satelite in under 2 hours

Bill

Get into orbit and destroy the satelite in under 4 hours

Meh Get into orbit and destroy the satelite in 12 hours

All kerbals died of radiation poisoning

get into orbit and destroy the satellite in over 1 day

Rules

-You cannot use railguns or sunbeam you must destroy the satelite by slamming into it

Goodluck Kerbonauts

Edited August 17, 2012 by aceassasin
Forgot the rules

Destroy how? Using sunbeams? Railguns?

no destroyed by slamming into it at extremely high speeds
